results.title: Apocalypse Now
results.creator_credit: United Artists, American Zoetrope, Francis Ford Coppola, John Milius, Tom Sternberg, Michael Herr and Dean Tavoularis
results.brief_description: At the height of the Vietnam war, Captain Benjamin Willard is sent on a dangerous mission that, officially, “does not exist, nor will it ever exist.” His goal is to locate - and eliminate - a mysterious Green Beret Colonel named Walter Kurtz, who has been leading his personal army on illegal guerrilla missions into enemy territory.

constellations_other.name: Hell no, we won't go
constellations_other.description: The cultural, social, psychological and political effects of the Vietnam War have been explored through cinematic classics, musicals and comedies.

results.creator_credit_for_label: United Artists, American Zoetrope, Francis Ford Coppola, John Milius, Tom Sternberg, Michael Herr and Dean Tavoularis
results.description: At the height of the Vietnam war, Captain Benjamin Willard is sent on a dangerous mission that, officially, “does not exist, nor will it ever exist.” His goal is to locate - and eliminate - a mysterious Green Beret Colonel named Walter Kurtz, who has been leading his personal army on illegal guerrilla missions into enemy territory.

results.title: Another Evening with Fred Astaire
results.brief_description: A one-hour live television special starring Fred Astaire.
results.description: A one-hour live television special starring Fred Astaire.

results.title: Annabelle Comes Home
results.creator_credit: James Wan, Greg Dora, Gary Dauberman and Joe Howes
results.brief_description: Dtermined to keep Annabelle from wreaking more havoc, Ed and Lorraine Warren secure the possessed doll in their home, but it awakens the evil spirits among the artefacts for a night of terror.

constellations_other.name: Optical toys, Totoro and terrors
constellations_other.description: Victorian-era optical toys have inspired the biggest animation studios and the scariest horror films.

results.creator_credit_for_label: James Wan, Greg Dora, Gary Dauberman and Joe Howes
results.description: Determined to keep Annabelle from wreaking more havoc, demonologists Ed and Lorraine Warren bring the possessed doll to the locked artifacts room in their home, placing her “safely” behind sacred glass and enlisting a priest’s holy blessing. But an unholy night of horror awaits as Annabelle awakens the evil spirits in the room, who all set their sights on a new target—the Warrens’ ten-year-old daughter, Judy, and her friends.
description_for_label: Determined to keep Annabelle from wreaking more havoc, demonologists Ed and Lorraine Warren bring the possessed doll to the locked artifacts room in their home, placing her “safely” behind sacred glass and enlisting a priest’s holy blessing. But an unholy night of horror awaits as Annabelle awakens the evil spirits in the room, who all set their sights on a new target—the Warrens’ ten-year-old daughter, Judy, and her friends.

results.title: Animal Kingdom
results.creator_credit: Porchlight Films, Screen Australia, Film Victoria, Screen NSW, Fulcrum Media Finance, Liz Watts and David Michôd
results.brief_description: Following the death of his mother, J finds himself living with his estranged family, under the watchful eye of his doting grandmother, Smurf, mother to the Cody boys. J quickly comes to believe that he is a player in this world. But, as he soon discovers, this world is far larger and more menacing than he could ever imagine. J finds himself at the center of a cold-blooded revenge plot that turns the family upside down.

constellations_other.name: True blue, true crime
constellations_other.description: Robert Connolly's The Dry is a recent Australian crime blockbuster, but the writer, director and producer's first film (and first crime film) connects to a longstanding tradition of true-blue crime stories from some of our greatest filmmakers.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Porchlight Films, Screen Australia, Film Victoria, Screen NSW, Fulcrum Media Finance, Liz Watts and David Michôd

results.title: An Angel at My Table
results.headline_credit: Australia, New Zealand and United Kingdom, 1990
results.brief_description: Based on the autobiographical work of New Zealand writer Janet Frame, this production depicts the author at various stage of her life. Afflicted with mental and emotional issues, Frame grows up in an impoverished family and experiences numerous tragedies while still in her youth, including the deaths of two of her siblings. Portrayed as an adult by Kerry Fox, Frame finds acclaim for her writing while still in a mental institution, and her success helps her move on with her life.

results.title: Amy
results.creator_credit: On the Corner Films, Universal Music Group, Asif Kapadia and James Gay-Rees
results.brief_description: A documentary on the life of Amy Winehouse, the immensely talented yet doomed songstress. We see her from her teen years, where she already showed her singing abilities, to her finding success and then her downward spiral into alcoholism and drugs.

constellations_other.name: My Hometown: Archives woven into new narrative
constellations_other.description: Offering viewers a snapshot of life on the road for an Australian touring band in the 1960s, 'My Hometown', directed by Sari Braithwaite was developed reimagining archival 8mm footage shot by drummer Leon Isackson.

constellations_other.name: Making home movies
constellations_other.description: Home movies have inspired the form and plots of narrative cinema.

results.creator_credit_for_label: On the Corner Films, Universal Music Group, Asif Kapadia and James Gay-Rees

results.title: American Beauty
results.creator_credit: Jinks/Cohen Company, DreamWorks Pictures, Sam Mendes, Naomi Shohan, Alan Ball, Bruce Cohen, Dan Jinks and Julie Weiss
results.brief_description: Lester Burnham, a depressed suburban father in a mid-life crisis, decides to turn his hectic life around after developing an infatuation with his daughter’s attractive friend.

constellations_other.name: Making home movies
constellations_other.description: Home movies have inspired the form and plots of narrative cinema.

results.title: All the President's Men
results.creator_credit: Wildwood Enterprises, Warner Bros. Pictures, William Goldman, Alan J. Pakula, George Jenkins, Carl Bernstein, Bob Woodward, Walter Coblenz, Jon Boorstin and Michael Britton
results.brief_description: During the 1972 elections, two reporters’ investigation sheds light on the controversial Watergate scandal that compels President Richard Nixon to resign from his post.

constellations_other.name: Collective: investigative journalism on screen
constellations_other.description: In Collective, documentarian Alexander Nanau follows a team of journalists who uncover a far-reaching government conspiracy following a deadly nightclub fire in Romania that kills dozens.

constellations_other.name: Uncovering the truth
constellations_other.description: The images of Tank Man during the Tiananmen Square protests in 1989 were captured by photojournalists and shared around the world. The work of journalists has been key to uncovering abuses of power and are rich material for fictional and factual movies and TV.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Wildwood Enterprises, Warner Bros. Pictures, William Goldman, Alan J. Pakula, George Jenkins, Carl Bernstein, Bob Woodward, Walter Coblenz, Jon Boorstin and Michael Britton
results.description: During the 1972 elections, two reporters’ investigation sheds light on the controversial Watergate scandal that compels President Richard Nixon to resign from his post.

results.title: Alien³
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1992
results.brief_description: After escaping with Newt and Hicks from the alien planet, Ripley crash lands on Fiorina 161, a prison planet and host to a correctional facility. Unfortunately, although Newt and Hicks do not survive the crash, a more unwelcome visitor does. The prison does not allow weapons of any kind, and with aid being a long time away, the prisoners must simply survive in any way they can.
